long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Joking JIRA extension, you can change some frustrating Jira behaviors:

- Prevent emojis autocomplete
- Display sprint goal as title
- Force display copy issue link

++++

Support (and source code) can be found at GitHub: https://github.com/alamirault/joking-jira-chrome-extension

++++

I am not affiliated with Atlassian in any way.
